jot.physics

Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.AbstractMaterial
      • jot.physics.Material
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRayTracerMaterial

    public class Material
extends AbstractMaterial
    Class that implements material properties, in RayTracers/RayCsasters this class might be extended.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

        public boolean isOpaque()
